author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch our Student Showcase 2025 for a glimpse at some of the inspiring Unreal Engine projects students have been working on in 2025.
The Student Showcase is a yearly reel of our favorite non-professional Unreal Engine projects. 

It’s a showcase of the imagination and Unreal Engine expertise of the brightest emerging talent in real-time 3D. 

Employers, developers, VFX supervisors, and producers—take note! This is your window into the industry’s next superstars, and they’re bound to be snapped up fast. 

Find out more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#StudentShowcase2025, #UnrealEngine
title: The Unreal Engine Student Showcase 2025
